snippet: A 25-year-old Texas law student explains why he posted instructions on how to make a gun using 3-D printing technology, which were downloaded more than 100,000 times before being taken down.
abstract: A 25-year-old Texas law student explains why he posted instructions on how to make a gun using 3-D printing technology, which were downloaded more than 100,000 times before being taken down.

headline.main: Printable-Gun Instructions Spread Online After State Dept. Orders Their Removal
